root.text: Tech trix is initiated with an aim to serve a perfect launch pad for technocrats to showcase their technical skills. Dive into this extravaganza and experience a complete package of fun, thrill and excellent.

text: A minimum knowledge in every fields of textiles is a prerequisite
Use of any electronic gadget is strictly prohibited
Materials that are required will be provided
The decision of the judges shall be treated as final
It is a preliminary round. Mixture of choose the best answer and fill in the blanks will be given. The participants with higher score will be moving to the next round.
Logo identification and connections and  Technical Quiz . Blast the balloon and identify the logo present in it. Connect the displayed images and find the answer.
Identify the fabric specifications. Choose an inverted cup and find the specifications for the fabric present in it.
Scavenger Hunt. For the given questions, clues will be hidden in different places and all the clues must be collected to end the game.
Identify the working mechanism of a process or machine. Animation will be projected and the participants need to find it out.
